nl.tue.fingerpaint.shared.utils

Class Colour

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.tue.fingerpaint.shared.utils.Colour

  • public class Colour
extends Object
    A Colour is simply ... a colour. It can be used way easier than the default GWT CssColor though. For example, colours can be compared and the R, G and B values can be queried. Finally, this class provides a way to get a CSS colour representation as a string, just like the CssColor.
    Author:
    Group Fingerpaint
